translations: n.纠缠；铁丝网；缠绕物；牵连

phrs.translation: 纠缠, 纠葛, 量子纠缠
量子纠缠, 量子缠结, 量子缠绕, 量子纠缠态
光子纠缠, 双光子纠缠
链缠结, 分子链缠结, 超高拉伸性
脐带缠绕, 脐带绕颈

sentences.sentence: Many dolphins die each year from entanglement in fishing nets.
sentences.translation: 每年都有许多海豚被捕鱼网缠绕致死。

sentences.sentence: Many dolphins are accidentally killed through entanglement with fishing equipment.
sentences.translation: 很多海豚因捕鱼设备的缠绕而意外死亡。

sentences.sentence: While physicists have demonstrated entanglement with specially prepared atoms, no-one knows if it also exists between atoms making up human minds.
sentences.translation: 尽管物理学家已经证明了特制原子之间存在纠缠，但没人知道它是否也存在于组成人类思维的原子之间。
